plot: The director is making an epic film (in his mind) on a micro budget, and a competing studio will stop at nothing to sabotage the film. Can the dysfunctional cast and crew bond together to save the film?
title: The Chronicles of Hernia: The Lion, the Ditch and the Studio
plot_es: The director is making an epic film (in his mind) on a micro budget, and a competing studio will stop at nothing to sabotage the film. Can the dysfunctional cast and crew bond together to save the film?
original_name: The Chronicles of Hernia: The Lion, the Ditch and the Studio
plot_en: The director is making an epic film (in his mind) on a micro budget, and a competing studio will stop at nothing to sabotage the film. Can the dysfunctional cast and crew bond together to save the film?
